title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: Ron Suart has served as both caretaker and interim manager. José Mourinho has served two different periods as permanent manager, while Guus Hiddink has been interim manager twice.

title: Enzo Maresca - Wikipedia
snippet: In the end, Maresca led Chelsea to a fourth place finish, the first time that the club qualified for the UEFA Champions League since the 2021–22 season under Thomas Tuchel. On 28 May 2025, Maresca won his first trophy as the Chelsea manager by winning the UEFA Conference League after beating ...

title: Chelsea F.C. - Wikipedia
snippet: After a poor start to the 2007–08 season, Mourinho was replaced by Avram Grant, who led the club to their first UEFA Champions League final, which they lost on penalties to Manchester United. The club did not turn a profit in the first nine years of Abramovich's ownership, and made record losses of £140m in June 2005. In 2009, under caretaker manager Guus Hiddink, Chelsea won another FA Cup.
